key_takeaways: Solution: Implement immediate response protocol - reply right away with clear yes/no (Difficulty: beginner)
Solution: Energy-based calendar auditing and selective meeting acceptance (Difficulty: intermediate)
Growth Tactic: Natural content creation leveraging existing skills (Channel: content)
Strategy: Immediate email response protocol to avoid inbox buildup
Strategy: Energy-based calendar management - only schedule meetings with people who energize you

market_gaps.title: Calendar filled with energy-draining meetings

comment_derived_trends.trend: Browser extension users prefer cross-platform solutions and free pricing models
supporting_comments: I'd call them browser extensions rather than Chrome extensions, personally I don't like Chrome and I've never paid for a browser extension either but do find them useful.
comment_derived_trends.business_implication: Browser extension businesses should focus on cross-browser compatibility and freemium models
